items.title: Typhoon Kalmaegi hits Vietnam after killing at least 114 in Philippines
items.description: More than 260,000 soldiers are on standby for rescue efforts as winds of up to 92mph (149km/h) hit Vietnam.

items.title: Nancy Pelosi announces retirement after decades in US Congress
items.description: Pelosi made history as the first female Speaker and left an indelible mark on US politics.

items.title: Man held after cars in German city found smeared with swastikas in blood
items.description: Cars, walls and postboxes were defaced, in what appeared to be human blood.

items.title: Trump wants South Africa out of the G20 as it gears up for world summit
items.description: The US leader has repeatedly accused South Africa of persecuting its white minority - which Pretoria denies.

items.title: Was climate change to blame for the strength of Hurricane Melissa?
items.description: A new study find that Hurricane Melissa's rapid intensification was six times more likely because of climate change.
